channel.title: Atanas K. Stefanov
channel.description: Welcome to my humble webspace, where I share what problems trouble me in academic and non-academic settings.

item.title: A guided derivation of the Noether theorem
item.description: A guided derivation of the Noether theorem, slightly elaborated from the lecture notes of PHAS0065: Galaxy Dynamics, Formation and Evolution, University College London.

item.title: Generating Chess960 positions with a coin
item.description: I give a brief description of a method that uses 10 flips of a fair coin to generate a Chess960 position. It makes use of the Chess960 numbering scheme, explained in Wikipedia, and of the circumstance that $960=2^{10}-2^6$.

item.title: Tile cartograms (tilegrams) of baseline parameters in Bulgarian regions
item.description: I showcase somewhat accurate hex-tile cartograms for a few interesting statistical parameters across Bulgarian adiministrative regions.
